Title: Series: Palazzo Granducale in Firenze
Description: The Holy Family seated before a wall resting on their flight into Egypt, after Correggio Engraving
Curator's comments: In reverse after a painting by Giovanni de Mio in the Palazzo Pitti. See M. Mussini 'Correggio tradotto', 1995, n.583 (with no mention of painting by Mio). For comment on series see 1861,0608.278.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
